mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(board_state,Location,board_no,writer,title,content,board_date, board_img0,board_img1,board_img2,board_img3,board_img4,board_img5,board_img6,board_img7,board_img8,board_img9) values('notice','P',(select ifnull(max(BOARD_NO+0),0)+1 from board a where board_state = 'notice'),#{writer},#{title},#{content},now(), #{boardImg0},#{boardImg1},#{boardImg2},#{boardImg3},#{boardImg4},#{boardImg5},#{boardImg6},#{boardImg7},#{boardImg8},#{boardImg9})
mapper.select: SELECT board.board_state boardState, board.board_no boardNo, board.writer as writer, board.title as title, board.content as content, board.board_img0 boardImg0, board.board_img1 boardImg1, board.board_img2 boardImg2, board.board_img3 boardImg3, board.board_img4 boardImg4, board.board_img5 boardImg5, board.board_img6 boardImg6, board.board_img7 boardImg7, board.board_img8 boardImg8, board.board_img9 boardImg9, DATE_FORMAT(board.board_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as boardDate FROM (SELECT @RNUM:=@RNUM+1 AS rnum , t.* FROM (SELECT @RNUM:=0) R, (select board_state,board_no,writer,title,board_Date,content,board_img0,board_img1,board_img2,board_img3,board_img4,board_img5,board_img6,board_img7,board_img8,board_img9 FROM (SELECT board_state,board_no,writer,title,board_Date,content,board_img0,board_img1,board_img2,board_img3,board_img4,board_img5,board_img6,board_img7,board_img8,board_img9 from board where board_state='notice' and location='P' order by board_no+0 desc) a) t ) board where rnum BETWEEN ((#{curPage}-1)*10)+1 AND #{curPage}*10
select count(board_no) from board where board_state='notice' and location='P'

select board_no boardNo, writer as writer, title as title, content as content, board_img0 boardImg0, board_img1 boardImg1, board_img2 boardImg2, board_img3 boardImg3, board_img4 boardImg4, board_img5 boardImg5, board_img6 boardImg6, board_img7 boardImg7, board_img8 boardImg8, board_img9 boardImg9, DATE_FORMAT(board_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as boardDate from board where board_state='notice' and location='P' and board_No=#{boardNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO=${boardNo} AND board_state='notice' and location='P'
